snippet.title: How do you stop itchy feet?
snippet.description: Why does my boyfriend have itchy feet? It's not contagious, 'cause I don't have it. But it drives him nuts...

snippet.title: What would cause itchy feet at night?
snippet.description: my feet and sometimes my hands itch really bad at night

snippet.title: What is causing my itchy feet?
snippet.description: ...wear flip flops 98% of the time. Sometimes applying foot lotion helps, sometimes it doesn't. Any idea what this may be caused by?

snippet.title: What causes extremely itchy feet?
snippet.description: The itch is in, rather than on, the skin and doesnt respond to athletes foot treatment.

snippet.title: Itchy feet?
snippet.description: lately, the bottom of the feet have been a little itchy. I know this sounds a...its a foot fungus or athletes foot of some sort, but i sure hope not. if...

snippet.title: Why is my feet feel itch when I'm standing?
snippet.description: sometimes,when i'm standing,i always feel itchy and sometimes pain.It's hard for me to work or walk.how can I cure it?

snippet.title: What can cause itchy palms and feet?
snippet.description: ...viral infection? I just don't buy it because I had the itchy palms/feet before. I've never had the other symptoms though so...

snippet.title: Causes of burning itchy feet?
snippet.description: My feet like where my calluses are on my heals are itchy a lot lately anyone have any ideas why or are calluses...

snippet.title: What causes an Itchy Foot?
snippet.description: the pad of my foot is really itchy at the moment, no matter how much i scratch it's still itchy >.> I've been barefoot all day

snippet.title: Itchy feet....?
